title: New: Koronis – Weave
body:
What with it being ‘Piano Day’ today, it makes sense to share a piece of the beautiful compositions currently being shared online.

Drawing from the author of Piano Day itself, Nils Frahm, this offering from **Koronis** is a downright gorgeous experience. Check it out below, or to feel the full effect, check out the animation that goes alongside _Weave_.

Drawing from the author of Piano Day itself, Nils Frahm, this offering from Koronis is a downright gorgeous experience. Check it out below, or to feel the full effect, check out the animation \[…\]
